name: GitHub Actions: Node CI
description: Add a Node.js CI workflow with version matrix and cache.

files.template:
name: CI

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main ]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      matrix:
        node-version: [18.x, 20.x]
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: \${{ matrix.node-version }}
          cache: 'npm'
      - run: npm ci
      - run: npm run -s lint || echo 'no lint'
      - run: npm test --silent || echo 'no tests'
